modName: Demonic Mermaid Armor BBP and Medusa Armor
summary:
Demonic Mermaid Armor BBP and Medusa Armor
The mermaids who are Demonic spirits, half humanoid and the lower part of fish, are immortal beings. Marine spirits are dangerous.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b]Demonic Mermaid Armor BBP and Medusa Armor[/b][/size][/color]
 Female Armour[color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b][/b][/size][/color][/center][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b]
[center][img]https://41.media.tumblr.com/eb841ccab53e9a89404fa7b75d2751d7/tumblr_nftlerycpb1s7mtq8o2_r1_1280.png[/img][/center][/b][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][size=2]                                  Mod includes:
                                  Demonic Mermaid Armor
                                  Demonic Mermaid Armor Full
                                  Demonic Mermaid Armor Full Dark
                                  Demonic Medusa Armor
                                  Coral Mermaid Armor (Red)
                                  Coral Mermaid Armor (Blu)
                                  Demonic Sword[/size][/size][/color][b]
[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][size=2]                                ----------------------------------
[/size][/size][/color][size=2]                                 [/size][/b][size=2]Update 1.3   Fix Coral Mermaid Armor[/size][b]
[/b][/size][/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][center][size=2]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/center][b]
[/b][/size][/color][center][color=#f4f4f4][size=4][b]Demonic Mermaid Armor[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][youtube]NyZ36zgx2j4[/youtube][/center]
[center]The mermaids who are Demonic spirits, half humanoid and the lower part of fish, are immortal beings. Marine spirits are dangerous.[/center]

[center]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center][size=4][size=2]Update 1.1[/size][/size][size=4] [/size][b][size=4]Demonic Medusa Armor[/size][/b][/center]

[center][b][youtube]GKV3HbFm8_k[/youtube][/b][/center]
[center]Medusa, originally a beautiful young woman, which any who gaze into its eyes will turn to stone.[/center][center][/center][center]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[center][size=2]Update 1.2[/size][size=4][size=2] [/size][b]Coral Mermaid Armor[/b][/size]
and Fix First person[/center][center]

                                     Requirements:
                                     You have to install a skeleton which supports BBP such as XP32’s or Skulltyrant’s.
